729507f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Wright Avenue
729507f-a.text:
2672 Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of
Wright Avenue. It was thought to have been an old Decker house. It was purchased many years ago by Captain Garrett P. Wright for one of his children. The real estate atlases from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belonged to the Wrights. The street shown is Wright Avenue. See also "Legends, Stories and Folklore of Old Staten Island" by Hines and Davis,
p. 115.

September 28, 1924
By William T. Davis through P.L. Sperr
729507f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Wright Avenue, Staten Island, NY
